about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hi! I'm Federico, a full-stack web developer with {years} years of experience dedicated to building incredible web experiences.

I love transforming ideas into digital reality, paying special attention to code quality and usability. I work comfortably with HTML, CSS, TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, and I really enjoy discovering and using new tools that improve my work.

If you have a project in mind, I'd love to chat and see how I can help you bring it to life!

generator.description: I updated an internal utility for generating Frontend and Backend projects. New scripts and configurations were added to enable automatic dependency updates, using the latest recommended ESLint configurations and simplifying the tool's usage with npx.

stellar.description: I implemented offline support in the application for marina administrators, allowing access to key functionalities without an internet connection and improving the user experience in situations with limited connectivity. I also configured the application to be used as a PWA and installed on mobile devices thanks to PWABuilder. For this, technologies such as Tanstack Query were used for offline mutation management, Service Workers for resource caching, and React and Next.js for the Frontend.

molo.description: I optimized application performance in sections with extensive forms (more than 50 fields) by using React Hook Forms and custom validations, which improved data collection efficiency. Additionally, infinite tables were optimized by implementing virtualization and scroll pagination techniques for better performance. Tanstack Virtual and Tanstack Query were used.

sofia.description: I developed the integration of Algolia for product search, significantly improving the user experience by enabling fast and efficient searches for one of the leading e-commerce companies in Bolivia. Technologies used: Express, React, SQL, MySQL, Next.js, GraphQL.

liteboxWebsite.description: I developed a complex carousel with Vue.js and CSS, facing challenges in animations and UI/UX requirements. After analyzing various libraries, Splide.js was implemented, significantly customizing it with CSS to meet design and user experience specifications, achieving fluid animations and custom behavior.

webService.title: Web Service
webService.description:
It's a final degree e-commerce project to connect the supply and demand of services (plumbing, classes, etc.). I led the team in the organization and development of the project.

It offers service publication, a rating system, a shopping cart with payments (MercadoPago/PayPal), and real-time chat. It includes user and administrator panels with statistics.

Developed with React, Express, PostgreSQL, and Material UI, we implemented complete functionalities including authentication. It's a fully functional study project.

videogames.title: Videogames
videogames.description:
Was an individual final degree project that consisted of developing a web application for searching and managing video games.

It offers search and filtering of video games (using the RAWG API), creation of new video games, pagination, and a detail page. It is also responsive.

Developed with React, Express, and PostgreSQL, this individual project was crucial for my full-stack learning and the integration of APIs like the RAWG API.

snake.title: Snake React
snake.description:
It's a recreation of the classic Snake video game, developed as a personal challenge to explore React's capabilities in creating interactive game logic.

It offers three difficulty levels, sound effects, and is fully responsive, working on desktop and mobile devices with touch controls or buttons.

With a simple design, the main focus was the challenging implementation of the game logic in React, resulting in a valuable learning experience.
